quoteText: Well, we're living in a material world, and I'm a material girl... or boy.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: Chemistry can be a good and bad thing. Chemistry is good when you make love with it. Chemistry is bad when you make crack with it.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: Well I have a microphone and you don't so you will listen to every damn word I have to say!
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: My name is Adam Sandler. I'm not particularly talented. I'm not particularly good-looking. And yet I'm a multi-millionaire.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: I know I want to always do the best I can.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: I was raised by a mother who told me I was great every day of my life.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: Sir one more comment like that and I will strangle you with my microphone wire!
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: A lot of critics object to what I do, but I got into comedy to make people laugh, and I've always worked hard.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: I had my moments of being humiliated, and then I had moments of doing something humiliating. I'm glad I lived out both roles.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: My father wasn't perfect. He had a temper. I took some of that. He would snap, but the older he got, he started calming down. He learned about life, but the thing that he taught my whole family was that family was the most important thing and, no matter what, if a family member needs you, you go and help them out; you get there.
author: Adam Sandler
